languages.text: Вести полноценный бой против твари, превосходящей своими размерами пустотный корабль — провальное дело, но неожиданность взяла свое: получив удар, тварь ослабила хватку, и судно устремилось вперед. Прежде чем чудовище сумело вновь сомкнуть свои щупальца вокруг корпуса, Навигатор и команда начали аварийный выход в реальный мир. Непредусмотренный прыжок закончился успешно — не считая небольших повреждений на корпусе.

traits.locale_text: Вести полноценный бой против твари, превосходящей своими размерами пустотный корабль — провальное дело, но неожиданность взяла свое: получив удар, тварь ослабила хватку, и судно устремилось вперед. Прежде чем чудовище сумело вновь сомкнуть свои щупальца вокруг корпуса, Навигатор и команда начали аварийный выход в реальный мир. Непредусмотренный прыжок закончился успешно — не считая небольших повреждений на корпусе.

languages.text: Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a voidship is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency translation to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.
languages.original_text: Вести полноценный бой против твари, превосходящей своими размерами пустотный корабль — провальное дело, но неожиданность взяла свое: получив удар, тварь ослабила хватку, и судно устремилось вперед. Прежде чем чудовище сумело вновь сомкнуть свои щупальца вокруг корпуса, Навигатор и команда начали аварийный выход в реальный мир. Непредусмотренный прыжок закончился успешно — не считая небольших повреждений на корпусе.

traits.locale_text: Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a void vessel is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around its hull again, Navigator and the team engaged an emergency transition to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.

Before the monster could close its tentacles around its hull again, Navigator and the team engaged an emergency transition to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.

Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency transition to realspace. Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a voidship is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency translation to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.

languages.text: 试图对抗比虚空舰还要庞大的生物是个愚蠢的决定，但这出其不意的攻击确实起到了相当程度的效果。那只怪物遭到了突然打击之后，松开了触手，舰船抓紧机会朝前冲去。怪物的触手还没来得及再次攫住舰船，导航者和船员们就紧急跳跃到了真实世界。这场紧急跳跃大获成功，尽管船体依然受到了轻微损伤。
languages.original_text: Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a voidship is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency translation to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.

traits.locale_text: 试图对抗比虚空舰还要庞大的生物是个愚蠢的决定，但这出其不意的攻击确实起到了相当程度的效果。那只怪物遭到了突然打击之后，松开了触手，舰船抓紧机会朝前冲去。怪物的触手还没来得及再次攫住舰船，导航者和船员们就紧急跳跃到了真实世界。这场紧急跳跃大获成功，尽管船体依然受到了轻微损伤。

languages.text: Intentar luchar contra una criatura del tamaño de una nave del vacío es una locura, pero el factor sorpresa es algo importante: tras recibir un golpe, la criatura soltó sus tentáculos y dejó que la nave avanzara. Antes de que el monstruo pudiera volver a cerrar sus tentáculos alrededor del casco, la Navegante y la tripulación ejecutaron una transición de emergencia al espacio real. El salto imprevisto fue un éxito, aunque el casco sufrió daños menores.
languages.original_text: Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a voidship is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency translation to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.

traits.locale_text: Intentar luchar contra una criatura del tamaño de una nave del vacío es una locura, pero el factor sorpresa es algo importante: tras recibir un golpe, la criatura soltó sus tentáculos y dejó que la nave avanzara. Antes de que el monstruo pudiera volver a cerrar sus tentáculos alrededor del casco, la Navegante y la tripulación ejecutaron una transición de emergencia al espacio real. El salto imprevisto fue un éxito, aunque el casco sufrió daños menores.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップの大きさを超えた生物と戦うなんてバカバカしい話だが、なんとも意外な展開になった。その生物は攻撃を喰らうと締め付ける力を緩めて、船は前方に急発進する。怪物の触手にまた捕まってしまう前に、航宙士とクルーはリアルスペースへの緊急移動を実行した。船体はわずかに傷ついたが、計画になかったジャンプは成功した。
languages.original_text: Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a voidship is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency translation to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップの大きさを超えた生物と戦うなんてバカバカしい話だが、なんとも意外な展開になった。その生物は攻撃を喰らうと締め付ける力を緩めて、船は前方に急発進する。怪物の触手にまた捕まってしまう前に、航宙士とクルーはリアルスペースへの緊急移動を実行した。船体はわずかに傷ついたが、計画になかったジャンプは成功した。

languages.text: Tenter d'affronter une créature bien plus imposante que le vaisseau lui-même peut paraître complètement fou, mais l'effet de surprise est un atout des plus puissants : après avoir essuyé un tir, la créature relâche son emprise, ce qui permet au vaisseau de mettre les gaz. Avant que l'abomination ait pu refermer de nouveau ses tentacules autour de la coque, la navigatrice et son équipage réussissent une transition d'urgence vers l'espace réel. Le saut improvisé est un succès, bien que la coque ait été légèrement endommagée.
languages.original_text: Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a voidship is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency translation to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.

traits.locale_text: Tenter d'affronter une créature bien plus imposante que le vaisseau lui-même peut paraître complètement fou, mais l'effet de surprise est un atout des plus puissants : après avoir essuyé un tir, la créature relâche son emprise, ce qui permet au vaisseau de mettre les gaz. Avant que l'abomination ait pu refermer de nouveau ses tentacules autour de la coque, la navigatrice et son équipage réussissent une transition d'urgence vers l'espace réel. Le saut improvisé est un succès, bien que la coque ait été légèrement endommagée.

languages.text: Einer Kreatur entfliehen zu wollen, die größer ist als ein Raumschiff, ist zwecklos. Das Überraschungselement kann jedoch mächtig sein: Nachdem die Kreatur einen Treffer einstecken musste, lockerte sie ihren Griff und das Schiff konnte sich ruckartig vorwärts bewegen. Bevor das Monster seine Tentakeln wieder um den Rumpf legen konnte, führte die Navigatorin einen Notfallübertritt in den Realraum aus. Der ungeplante Sprung war erfolgreich, auch wenn der Rumpf leichte Schäden davontrug.
languages.original_text: Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a voidship is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency translation to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.

Der ungeplante Sprung war erfolgreich, auch wenn der Rumpf leichte Schäden davontrug.

languages.text: Bir uçsuz gemisinden daha büyük bir yaratığa karşı savaşmak çılgınlık olsa da sürpriz unsuru güçlü bir etki yarattı. Darbe alan yaratık, şiddetini azaltarak gemiyi serbest bıraktı. Yeniden gövdeyi sarmadan önce Rotacı ile mürettebat, gemiyi acilen gerçekuzaya geçirdi. Geminin gövdesi hafif hasar alsa da plansız sıçrama başarılı oldu.
languages.original_text: Trying to fight against a creature surpassing the size of a voidship is folly, but the element of surprise is a powerful thing: after receiving a blow, the creature loosened its grip and let the ship surge forward. Before the monster could close its tentacles around the hull again, the Navigator and the crew executed an emergency translation to realspace. The unplanned jump was a success, although the hull did take minor damage.
